languages.text: {n}Тонкая игла аккуратно проходит между веком и глазным яблоком. Непринужденно, словно поправляя столовый прибор во время обеда, Кибелла придерживает вашу руку.{/n} "Важно закалять плоть, а не калечить".

{n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."
languages.original_text: {n}Тонкая игла аккуратно проходит между веком и глазным яблоком. Непринужденно, словно поправляя столовый прибор во время обеда, Кибелла придерживает вашу руку.{/n} "Важно закалять плоть, а не калечить".

traits.locale_text: {n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah supports your hand casually, as if she is adjusting tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose here is to fortify the flesh without crippling it."

{n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah supports your hand casually, as if she is adjusting tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose here is to fortify the flesh without crippling it."

{n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

{n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

{n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

{n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

languages.text: {n}La aguja se hunde justo entre el párpado y el globo ocular. Kibellah coge tu mano y ajusta el ángulo de entrada con la misma indiferencia como quien recoloca la cubertería sobre la mesa.{/n} «El propósito de esta práctica consiste en fortalecer la carne, no en mutilarla».
languages.original_text: {n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

traits.locale_text: {n}La aguja se hunde justo entre el párpado y el globo ocular. Kibellah coge tu mano y ajusta el ángulo de entrada con la misma indiferencia como quien recoloca la cubertería sobre la mesa.{/n} «El propósito de esta práctica consiste en fortalecer la carne, no en mutilarla».

languages.text: {n}針が瞼と眼球の間に入っていく。キベラは手を伸ばし、まるで夕食の食器を正すかのように、さりげなくあなたの手の位置を調整する。{/n}「この修行も目的は肉体を強化することよ。肉体を切断することじゃない」
languages.original_text: {n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

traits.locale_text: {n}針が瞼と眼球の間に入っていく。キベラは手を伸ばし、まるで夕食の食器を正すかのように、さりげなくあなたの手の位置を調整する。{/n}「この修行も目的は肉体を強化することよ。肉体を切断することじゃない」

languages.text: {n}长针刚好刺入了眼睑和眼球之间的位置。绮贝菈伸出手来，调整着你的手，就仿佛像是在整理餐具一样随意。{/n}“这种仪式的目的是为了锻炼肉体，而不是将它破坏。”
languages.original_text: {n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

traits.locale_text: {n}长针刚好刺入了眼睑和眼球之间的位置。绮贝菈伸出手来，调整着你的手，就仿佛像是在整理餐具一样随意。{/n}“这种仪式的目的是为了锻炼肉体，而不是将它破坏。”

languages.text: {n}Die Nadel dringt zwischen Lid uns Augapfel ein. Kibellah greift nach deiner Hand und führt sie so ruhig, als würde sie das Besteck bei Tisch zurechtrücken.{/n} "Der Sinn dieser Übung besteht darin, das Fleisch zu stärken, nicht, es zu verstümmeln."
languages.original_text: {n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Nadel dringt zwischen Lid uns Augapfel ein. Kibellah greift nach deiner Hand und führt sie so ruhig, als würde sie das Besteck bei Tisch zurechtrücken.{/n} "Der Sinn dieser Übung besteht darin, das Fleisch zu stärken, nicht, es zu verstümmeln."

languages.text: {n}L'aiguille s'enfonce dans l'espace entre sa paupière et son globe oculaire. Kibellah tend la main et guide la vôtre d'un geste aussi désinvolte que si elle dressait le couvert pour le dîner.{/n} « L'objectif de cet exercice est de fortifier la chair, pas de la mutiler. »
languages.original_text: {n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'aiguille s'enfonce dans l'espace entre sa paupière et son globe oculaire. Kibellah tend la main et guide la vôtre d'un geste aussi désinvolte que si elle dressait le couvert pour le dîner.{/n} « L'objectif de cet exercice est de fortifier la chair, pas de la mutiler. »

languages.original_text: {n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."

languages.text: {n}İğne, göz kapağıyla göz küresi arasından giriveriyor. Kibellah uzanıp tutuşunu düzeltiyor. Bunu öylesine fevri bir şekilde yapıyor ki gören, masaya dizilmiş çatal bıçağı düzeltiyor sanır.{/n} "Bu idmanın amacı; bedeni sakat bırakmak değil, güçlendirmektir."
languages.original_text: {n}The needle goes in right between the lid and the eyeball. Kibellah reaches out and adjusts your hand as casually as though she were straightening out the tableware at dinner.{/n} "The purpose of this practice is to fortify the flesh, not to mutilate it."
